wikipedia_page.main: Edward Ross was a Scottish rugby union player.He was capped once for Scotland in 1904. He also played for London Scottish FC.He was the brother of James Ross who was also capped for Scotland.

response: *Edward Ross (rugby union), Scottish rugby union player
He was capped for  five times between 1901 and 1903. He also played for London Scottish FC, which he had captained in 1901-02 and 1904–05. His brother Edward Ross, also gained a single cap in 1904.
